National Association of Educational Broadcasters
University of Illinois
Urbana, Illinois
My dear Frank:
In rushing to make the plane last week, I
overlooked talking to you about the National Defense cooperation
resolution.
I don’t know whether any of the other members of
the Committee told you that while you were away, I brought up
the matter of designating a contact representative for the
Committee so that we might be able to get the jump on the other
stations and actually work out an effective weekly program for
all of our station. I volunteered my services and was accepted
by the Committee to take over the job.
I am confident that it can be done for I know
that the Information people of the Commission are looking for
assistance. We have worked out a very satisfactory program idea
for WNYC and I haven’t any doubt that I can work out something
similar for all of our groups. I hope you haven't advised them
of our official action as yet so that you can incorporate the
Executive Committee action when you do write them.
Sincerely yours,
Director
